item.title: Lachlan Murdoch Says Family Trust Settlement Is “Great News for Investors”

item.title: Succession War Over, Lachlan Murdoch Turns to Next Era of Empire Building
item.description: With Rupert’s blessing, his eldest son outfought, outlasted and ultimately spent billions buying out his siblings as his brother James throws in the towel on trying to force changes to Fox and News Co

item.title: Lachlan Wins Murdoch Succession War as Siblings Take Major Buyouts, Legal Battle Settles
item.description: James, Elisabeth and Prudence will receive cash from the sale of News Corp. and Fox stock.
